text: Hi everyone! Is there currently a way to automaticaly adjust `ylims` after having changed an axis `xlims` , so that it corresponds to the whole y-interval in which plotted data lives within the specified `xlims`? Just like plotting some data on an empty axis redefines both limits.

text: No because plot objects only report their whole boundingbox. One would have to implement a partial boundingbox feature for this
